trans-unit.source: Please allow to use camera for placing your pet
trans-unit.target: Пожалуйста, предоставьте доступ к камере для размещения питомца

trans-unit.note: PetMenu reset pet alert action cancel

trans-unit.id: Do you really want to reset your pet data?
trans-unit.source: Do you really want to reset your pet data?
trans-unit.target: Вы действительно хотите сбросить ваши достижения?

trans-unit.id: I miss you! Please come back!
trans-unit.source: I miss you! Please come back!
trans-unit.target: Я потерял тебя! Возвращайся ко мне!

trans-unit.id: Please give access to camera in settings your phone for use AR in application.
trans-unit.source: Please give access to camera in settings your phone for use AR in application.
trans-unit.target: Пожалуйста, предоставьте доступ к камере в настройках своего телефона.

trans-unit.note: PetMenu reset pet alert action yes
Class = "UILabel"; text = "With love for Nadin Koc"; ObjectID = "1St-BP-um1";

trans-unit.source: Move the phone to adjust the AR
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Move the phone to adjust the AR"; ObjectID = "1UK-ts-Oao";

trans-unit.source: The levels of satiety, energy, joy, and cleanness are reduced within 16 hours. Then the pet dies
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "The levels of satiety, energy, joy, and cleanness are reduced within 16 hours. Then the pet dies"; ObjectID = "2El-Os-KXb";
trans-unit.target: Параметры сытости, сна, радости, и чистоты уменьшаются в течении 16 часов. После чего питомец погибает.

trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Count of days from birth:"; ObjectID = "8dL-zd-2aj";

trans-unit.source: When you feed a pet, level of cleanliness decreases. If not clean up after pet, the level of joy will not increase
trans-unit.target: Когда вы кормите питомца - уменьшается чистота. Если не убирать за питомцем, то радость не будет пополняться.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "When you feed a pet, level of cleanliness decreases. If not clean up after pet, the level of joy will not increase"; ObjectID = "AIq-JC-KDM";

trans-unit.source:
Your pet can visit another pet. For this you get extra points. While your pet is visiting, you will not be able to control it.
Bring the two devices close together with running app and tap the button below.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Your pet can visit another pet. For this you get extra points. While your pet is visiting, you will not be able to control it.\n\nBring the two devices close together with running app and tap the button below."; ObjectID = "FWF-yZ-mU9";
trans-unit.target:
Вы можете отправить своего питомца в гости к другому питомцу. За это вы получаете дополнительные очки.
Пока ваш питомец находится в гостях, вы не сможете им управлять.

trans-unit.source: After placing the pet on the surface, you can replace him by tapping the screen
trans-unit.target: После размещения питомца на поверхности, вы можете разместить его в другом месте просто нажав на экран
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "After placing the pet on the surface, you can replace him by tapping the screen"; ObjectID = "J5J-Ux-1JA";

trans-unit.source: Playing with a pet increases the level of joy, but the level of energy decreases
trans-unit.target: Игра с питомцем добавляет больше радости, но забирает его энергичность
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Playing with a pet increases the level of joy, but the level of energy decreases"; ObjectID = "Q7w-uH-ukk";

trans-unit.source: Your pet is visiting his friend now
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Your pet is visiting his friend now"; ObjectID = "R2y-PW-8kC";

trans-unit.source: Your pet's level has grown and you have received extra bonus points
trans-unit.target: Уровень вашего питомца вырос и вы получили дополнительные бонусы
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Your pet's level has grown and you have received extra bonus points"; ObjectID = "X2N-OX-UG8";

trans-unit.source: Pet level increases every 3 days. With each new level the pet grows up
trans-unit.target: Уровень питомца увеличивается каждые 3 дня. С каждым новым уровнем питомец вырастает
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Pet level increases every 3 days. With each new level the pet grows up"; ObjectID = "aPB-hD-nmn";

trans-unit.source: Ploot - AR app, which allows you to grow your personal pet in AR. Don’t forget to take care of him, feed in time, play and put him to sleep.
trans-unit.target: Ploot - приложение в дополненной реальности, которые позволит вам вырастить собственного виртуального питомца. Не забывайте ухаживать за ним, вовремя кормить, развлекать и укладывать спать.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Ploot - AR app, which allows you to grow your personal pet in AR. Don’t forget to take care of him, feed in time, play and put him to sleep."; ObjectID = "dAy-pp-na1";

trans-unit.source: When you visit the game every 12 hours - you get bonus points
trans-unit.target: Бонусы выдаются каждые 12 часов при регулярном посещении игры
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "When you visit the game every 12 hours - you get bonus points"; ObjectID = "ihG-ia-7Pm";

trans-unit.source: Touch on the name of pet for select it:
trans-unit.target: Выберите питомца, нажав на его имя:
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Touch on the name of pet for select it:"; ObjectID = "kPf-eg-cOE";

trans-unit.source: Touch to detected surface for placing of pet
trans-unit.target: Для размещения питомца, нажмите на обнаруженную поверхность
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Touch to detected surface for placing of pet"; ObjectID = "mlm-LU-YCa";

trans-unit.source: You get 2 bonus points for every minute when your pet is visiting a friend
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "You get 2 bonus points for every minute when your pet is visiting a friend"; ObjectID = "n22-IW-3iC";
trans-unit.target: Ваш питомец получает по 2 бонуса за каждую минуту нахождения в гостях.

trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Sorry, your pet is die"; ObjectID = "olL-g2-5la";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "You need give access to:"; ObjectID = "xzk-0K-mmj";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Start play with your pet"; ObjectID = "y5I-8X-Opo";
